Unforgettable fast food restaurant of Japanese sushi restaurant in Italy
February 24, 2010 admin Interior design , 0
The atmosphere is very distinct look of interior design that forms shown in the form of trying restaurant fast food that presents a unique form of Japanese sushi . This sosushi store modern minimalist interior is elegant and stunning design by combining the Japanese culture combined with a hint of modernity. sushi bar located in the center of Turin in Italy was designed by an Italian-based architecture office, UAU. The architects have turned the old stationery shop became very cold and the fashion bar oriented-sushi built with 45-meter square area located in the historic cities of Turin, Italy.
Charming design makes the visitors want to stay longer when they are in this sushi restaurant. The architect was successful in transforming the interior space refers to the sushi bar at least the tradition of contemporary architecture with the help of a clean cut shapes emphasized by a white matte finish detail and furniture where the magenta-depth research on the structure and form of contribution to defining a project in which each detail that really is not just left to chance. Space harmony through the use of a balanced composition of Plywood. For more information visit the USU
